articles.author: Amarachi Orie
articles.title: African elephants use names to call each other, study suggests - CNN
articles.description: Wild African elephants may address each other using individualized calls that resemble personal names used by humans, a new study suggests.
articles.content:
Wild African elephants may address each other using individualized calls that resemble the personal names used by humans, a new study suggests.
